Detailed Description

Exposes methods for accessing modules.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktModule::BaseAddress ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the module base address.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the module base address. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktModule::ExportedFunctions ( [out, retval] INktExportedFunctionsEnum **  ppExpFunc)

Get the functions exported by the module.

Parameters
[in,out]ppExpFuncAddress of pointer to receive the enumerator interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
HRESULT INktModule::FileHeader ( [out, retval] INktStructPEFileHeader **  ppVal)

Gets an interface to access the process image Portable Executable (PE) header.

Parameters
ppValAddress of pointer to receive the PE file header interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.
HRESULT INktModule::FileName ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the executable file name.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of string pointer to receive the module filename.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_OUTOFMEMORY if pVal points to a string with insufficient space.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktModule::FunctionByAddress ( [in] my_ssize_t  addr,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_TRUE)] VARIANT_BOOL  searchNearest,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function with the provided ordinal index.

Parameters
addrThe address to search.
searchNearestVARIANT_FALSE to match exact address, VARIANT_TRUE to match nearest function.
[in,out]ppExpFuncAddress of pointer to receive the matching exported function, if any.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if name is invalid or empty.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktModule::FunctionByName ( [in] BSTR  name,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function with the provided ordinal index.

Parameters
nameThe name to search for.
[in,out]ppExpFuncAddress of pointer to receive the matching exported function, if any..
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if name is invalid or empty.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktModule::FunctionByOrdinal ( [in] LONG  ordinal,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function with the provided ordinal index.

Parameters
ordinalThe ordinal.
[in,out]ppExpFuncAddress of pointer to receive the matching exported function, if any.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if ordinal is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.

Returns

HRESULT INktModule::Name ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the module's base name.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of string pointer to receive the module name. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_OUTOFMEMORY if pVal points to a string with insufficient space.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.

Parameters
ppValAddress of pointer to receive the PE optional header interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.
